analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Gryphon.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#183-207):
	External calls:
	- vault.deposit.value(_value)(_recipient) (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#196-197)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- preSaleRaised (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#197-198)

Gryphon.isPreSalePeriod (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#362-372) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Gryphon.crowdSaleState

Gryphon.isICOPeriod (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#372-383) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Gryphon.crowdSaleState

Reentrancy in Gryphon.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#183-207):
	External calls:
	- vault.deposit.value(_value)(_recipient) (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#203-204)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoRaised (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#205-206)

Gryphon.transfer (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#256-279) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(vested[msg.sender] >= _tokens_in_cents) (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#263-264)

Gryphon.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#279-307) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(vested[_from] >= _tokens_in_cents) (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#287)

Gryphon.approve (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#307-313) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(vested[msg.sender] >= _tokens_in_cents) (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#308-311)

Gryphon.getVested (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#224-255) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- vested_now > total_vested[_beneficiary] (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#248-254)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#238-255)
	- block.timestamp < start (/unique_chucks/46/0x42853c34b6ee66ea6dc5a894db5d3dee2aa701ee.sol#233-255)
